items.content_html: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.
items.title: bids24/Kalpanix: Kalpanix is a lightweight CSS framework that provides a simple CDN and pre-designed classes for creating responsive, modern web designs. Just include the CDN and apply the classes in your HTML to instantly style your site with ease and flexibility. Perfect for fast, clean UI development.

items.content_html: ⚡️ A lightweight, dependency-free library for generating highly customizable QR codes in browser environments. Leverage SVG to create stunning QR codes with unique designs and embedded logos. Fully documented for Angular and React, with no dependencies and just 40 kB after minification.
items.title: CyrilDesch/custom-qrcode-browser: ⚡️ A lightweight, dependency-free library for generating highly customizable QR codes in browser environments. Leverage SVG to create stunning QR codes with unique designs and embedded logos. Fully documented for Angular and React, with no dependencies and just 40 kB after minification.

items.content_html: Noads is a lightweight Chrome extension that removes specific DOM elements using CSS selectors, effectively blocking ads on web pages.
items.title: Jamison-Chen/Noads: Noads is a lightweight Chrome extension that removes specific DOM elements using CSS selectors, effectively blocking ads on web pages.

items.content_html: On this repo , I have a scalable, lightning-fast Node.js backend. Perfect for real-time processing and handling high volumes of traffic with efficiency. Built to be lightweight yet robust, this repo ensures rides are accepted, tracked, and completed without a hitch. ⚡
items.title: ashishjangde/Uber-Backend-Node-Ts: On this repo , I have a scalable, lightning-fast Node.js backend. Perfect for real-time processing and handling high volumes of traffic with efficiency. Built to be lightweight yet robust, this repo ensures rides are accepted, tracked, and completed without a hitch. ⚡

items.content_html: A simple back-end notes application built with Hapi.js. This project provides a RESTful API for managing notes (create, read, update, delete) stored in memory. Developed as part of a Dicoding assignment, it's a lightweight solution ideal for learning and small-scale projects.
items.title: kazuddd/notes-api-backend: A simple back-end notes application built with Hapi.js. This project provides a RESTful API for managing notes (create, read, update, delete) stored in memory. Developed as part of a Dicoding assignment, it's a lightweight solution ideal for learning and small-scale projects.
